title: German court sets trial for 100-year-old alleged Nazi guard
content:
1. German court sets trial for 100-year-old alleged Nazi guard  BBC News
  2. German court sets trial date for former Nazi guard, aged 100  Associated Press
  3. 100-year-old former Nazi concentration camp guard to be tried  The Guardian
  4. 100-year-old alleged ex-Nazi guard to stand trial on thousands of counts of being an accessory to murder  The Washington Post
  5. 100-year-old former death camp guard to be put on trial in Germany -repor  The Jerusalem Post
